thread.title: The Snazzy New X-Files Promo Is Our Favorite One So Far
thread.title_full: The Snazzy New X-Files Promo Is Our Favorite One So Far

author: TV Guide
title: The Snazzy New X-Files Promo Is Our Favorite One So Far
text: Posted Oct. 13, 2015 at 12:01 AM Updated at 2:27 AM Posted Oct. 13, 2015 at 12:01 AM Updated at 2:27 AM Â» Social News There are a lot of questions for you to ask yourself in a new, snazzy promo for The X-Files that aired during Monday's Gotham . The retro-style teaser features a series of Mulder and Scully sound bites, with one very special guest: the Cigarette-Smoking Man. And he has something very important to say. Take a look: The X-Files returns on Sunday, Jan. 24 at 10/9c on Fox. Other Links From TVGuide.com
